verses.verse: SHa'ul <S%G3972><s%>, called <S%G2822><s%> to be an emissary <S%G652><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Sosthenes <S%G4988><s%> our brother <S%G80><s%>,

Unto the Congregation <S%G1577><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Corinth <S%G2882><s%>, to them that are sanctified <S%G37><s%> <S%G5772><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>, called <S%G2822><s%> to be saints <S%G40><s%>, with <S%G4862><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that in <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> call upon <S%G1941><s%> <S%G5734><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%>, both <S%G5037><s%> theirs <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ours <S%G2257><s%>:

Grace <S%G5485><s%> be unto you <S%G5213><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%>, from <S%G575><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from the YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>.

I thank <S%G2168><s%> <S%G5719><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> on <S%G4012><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> behalf <S%G4012><s%>, for <S%G1909><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5685><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>;

That <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every thing <S%G3956><s%> ye are enriched <S%G4148><s%> <S%G5681><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> utterance <S%G3056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%>;
Havahn as <S%G2531><s%> the testimony <S%G3142><s%> of Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> was confirmed <S%G950><s%> <S%G5681><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>:

So that <S%G5620><s%> ye <S%G5209><s%> come behind <S%G5302><s%> <S%G5745><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3367><s%> gift <S%G5486><s%>; waiting for <S%G553><s%> <S%G5740><s%> the coming <S%G602><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>:

Who <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G950><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> confirm <S%G950><s%> <S%G5692><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%>, that ye may be blameless <S%G410><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>.

'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> is faithful <S%G4103><s%>, by <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> ye were called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5681><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the fellowship <S%G2842><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> I beseech <S%G3870><s%> <S%G5719><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, by <S%G1223><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye <S%G3004><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> speak <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5725><s%> the same thing <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that there be <S%G5600><s%> <S%G5753><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> divisions <S%G4978><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> that ye be <S%G5600><s%> <S%G5753><s%> perfectly joined together <S%G2675><s%> <S%G5772><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> mind <S%G3563><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> judgment <S%G1106><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it hath been declared <S%G1213><s%> <S%G5681><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, by <S%G5259><s%> them which are of the house <S%G3588><s%> of Chloe <S%G5514><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> contentions <S%G2054><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>.

Is <S%G3307><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> divided <S%G3307><s%> <S%G5769><s%>? <S%G3361><s%> was <S%G4717><s%> SHa'ul <S%G3972><s%> crucified <S%G4717><s%> <S%G5681><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>? or <S%G2228><s%> were ye immersed <S%G907><s%> <S%G5681><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of SHa'ul <S%G3972><s%>?

I thank <S%G2168><s%> <S%G5719><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I immersed <S%G907><s%> <S%G5656><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%>, but <S%G1508><s%> Crispus <S%G2921><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Gaius <S%G1050><s%>;
Lest <S%G3363><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> should say <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5632><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I had immersed <S%G907><s%> <S%G5656><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> mine own <S%G1699><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> I immersed <S%G907><s%> <S%G5656><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the household <S%G3624><s%> of Stephanas <S%G4734><s%>: besides <S%G3063><s%>, I know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> whether I immersed <S%G907><s%> <S%G5656><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> other <S%G243><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> <S%G5656><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to immerse <S%G907><s%> <S%G5721><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> to preach the gospel <S%G2097><s%> <S%G5733><s%>: not <S%G3756><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of words <S%G3056><s%>, lest <S%G3363><s%> the execution stake <S%G4716><s%> of Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> should be made of none effect <S%G2758><s%> <S%G5686><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the preaching <S%G3056><s%> of the execution stake <S%G4716><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> to them <S%G3303><s%> that perish <S%G622><s%> <S%G5730><s%> foolishness <S%G3472><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> which are saved <S%G4982><s%> <S%G5746><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5769><s%>, I will destroy <S%G622><s%> <S%G5692><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of the wise <S%G4680><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> will bring to nothing <S%G114><s%> <S%G5692><s%> the understanding <S%G4907><s%> of the prudent <S%G4908><s%>.

Where <S%G4226><s%> is the wise <S%G4680><s%>? where <S%G4226><s%> is the scribe <S%G1122><s%>? where <S%G4226><s%> is the disputer <S%G4804><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G165><s%>? hath <S%G3471><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> made foolish <S%G3471><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G2889><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> after <S%G1894><s%> that in <S%G1722><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5627><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, it pleased <S%G2106><s%> <S%G5656><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the foolishness <S%G3472><s%> of preaching <S%G2782><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> <S%G5658><s%> them that believe <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5723><s%>.

For <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1894><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> require <S%G154><s%> <S%G5719><s%> a sign <S%G4592><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the Greeks <S%G1672><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> <S%G5719><s%> after wisdom <S%G4678><s%>:

But <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> preach <S%G2784><s%> <S%G5719><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> crucified <S%G4717><s%> <S%G5772><s%>, unto the Jews <S%G2453><s%> a stumblingblock <S%G3303><s%> <S%G4625><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> unto the Greeks <S%G1672><s%> foolishness <S%G3472><s%>;

But <S%G1161><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are called <S%G2822><s%>, both <S%G5037><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Greeks <S%G1672><s%>, Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

Because <S%G3754><s%> the foolishness <S%G3474><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> wiser than <S%G4680><s%> men <S%G444><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the weakness <S%G772><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> stronger than <S%G2478><s%> men <S%G444><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> ye see <S%G991><s%> <S%G5719><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> calling <S%G2821><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, how that <S%G3754><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> wise men <S%G4680><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> mighty <S%G1415><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> noble <S%G2104><s%>, are called:

But <S%G235><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> hath chosen <S%G1586><s%> <S%G5668><s%> the foolish things <S%G3474><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> confound <S%G2617><s%> <S%G5725><s%> the wise <S%G4680><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> hath chosen <S%G1586><s%> <S%G5668><s%> the weak things <S%G772><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> confound <S%G2617><s%> <S%G5725><s%> the things which are mighty <S%G2478><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> base things <S%G36><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> things which are despised <S%G1848><s%> <S%G5772><s%>, hath <S%G1586><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> chosen <S%G1586><s%> <S%G5668><s%>, yea, and <S%G2532><s%> things which <S%G3588><s%> are <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>, to <S%G2443><s%> bring to nought <S%G2673><s%> <S%G5661><s%> things that are <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%>:
That <S%G3704><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3956><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> should glory <S%G2744><s%> <S%G5667><s%> in his presence <S%G1799><s%> <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> him <S%G846><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> <S%G5748><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> of <S%G575><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> is made <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5675><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> <S%G5037><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%>, and righteousness <S%G1343><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> sanctification <S%G38><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> redemption <S%G629><s%>:

That <S%G2443><s%>, according as <S%G2531><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5769><s%>, He that glorieth <S%G2744><s%> <S%G5740><s%>, let him glory <S%G2744><s%> <S%G5737><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%>.
